title: Orson Welles, Famous In Film, Also Brought Radio To Life
teaser: Orson Welles, born 100 years ago this week, is well-known for breaking new ground in theater and film. But, as author Colin Fleming tells NPR's Rachel Martin, he also did significant work in radio.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
